name: UberEats
description:
Uber Eats is a trial-like game.

Only the demo is done and it's the intro of the game with only the first level.

In the future the game will have more levels related to Uber Eats (new gameplay and content).

Controls :

Z - forward

S - backward

Q - lean backward

D - lean forward

Do not hesitate to give your positive or negative feedback.
